com.github.wuic
Class WuicFacade

java.lang.Object
  com.github.wuic.WuicFacade

public final class WuicFacade
extends Object

This class is a facade which exposes the WUIC features by simplifying them within some exposed methods.

Since:
0.1.0
Version:
1.9
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

clearTag

public void clearTag(String tag)

Clears the given tag in the ContextBuilder.

newInstance

public static WuicFacade newInstance(String contextPath,
                                     Boolean useDefaultConfigurator)
                              throws WuicException

Gets a new instance. If an error occurs, it will be wrapped in a WuicRuntimeException which will be thrown.

Parameters:
contextPath - the context where the nuts will be exposed
useDefaultConfigurator - use or not default configurators that injects default DAO and engines
Returns:
the unique instance
Throws:
WuicException - if the 'wuic.xml' path is not well configured

newInstance

public static WuicFacade newInstance(String contextPath,
                                     URL wuicXmlPath,
                                     Boolean useDefaultConfigurator)
                              throws WuicException

Gets a new instance. If an error occurs, it will be wrapped in a WuicRuntimeException which will be thrown.

Parameters:
wuicXmlPath - the specific wuic.xml path URL (could be null
useDefaultConfigurator - use or not default configurators that injects default DAO and engines
contextPath - the context where the nuts will be exposed
Returns:
the unique instance
Throws:
WuicException

configure

public void configure(ContextBuilderConfigurator... configurators)
               throws StreamException

Configures the internal builder with the given configurators.

Parameters:
configurators - the configurators
Throws:
StreamException - if an I/O error occurs

runWorkflow

public Nut runWorkflow(String id,
                       String path)
                throws WuicException

Gets the nut with the given path processed by the given workflow identified by the specified ID.

The path should be used with the name of nuts returned when invoking runWorkflow(String).

Parameters:
id - the workflow ID
path - the requested path, null to retrieve all paths
Returns:
the processed nuts
Throws:
WuicException - if the context can't be processed

runWorkflow

public List<Nut> runWorkflow(String id)
                      throws WuicException

Gets the nuts processed by the given workflow identified by the specified ID.

Parameters:
id - the workflow ID
Returns:
the processed nuts
Throws:
WuicException - if the context can't be processed
